EVERYTHING IS RANDOM INPUT_TYPE AND COMP_LARGE WHERE APPLICABLE

// MPI STRONG SCALING WITH 16777216 VALUES
mpi_strong_x = [2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024]
bubble_random_strong = [2.111359, 2.975754, 3.272589, 3.323230, 3.278866, 5.952056, 5.197721, 4.242933, 2.997196, 2.583551]
sample_random_strong = [3.169514, 1.581671, 0.795329, 0.401853, 0.210535, 0.115095, 0.069343, 0.046302, 0.032678, 0.029597]
merge_random_strong = [2.70981, 1.511685, 0.944433, 0.673576, 0.548911, 0.979714, 0.906321,nan, nan, nan]
bitonic_random_strong = [5.154654, 3.648062, 2.55387, 1.727448, 1.119517, 0.700388, 0.798923, 0.648205, 0.148106, 0.089176]


// MPI WEAK SCALING WITH 262144 VALUES PER THREAD
mpi_weak_x = [2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024]
sample_random_weak = [nan, 0.082967, 0.088221, 0.093475, 0.104285, 0.115095, 0.1476065, 0.180118, 0.29483899999999996, 0.40956]


// CUDA STRONG SCALING WITH 1048576 VALUES 
cuda_strong_x = [64, 128, 256, 512, 1024]
sample_random_strong = [0.000188, 0.000198, 0.000203, 0.000211, 0.000186]


// CUDA WEAK SCALING WITH 2048 VALUES PER BLOCK
cuda_weak_x = [64, 128, 256, 512, 1024]
sample_random_weak = [0.00017, 0.000158, 0.000152, 0.000211, 0.000235]


// MPI SPEED UP WITH 67108864 VALUES PER THREAD
mpi_speed_x = [2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024]
sample_random = [1.0, 1.9965932858421018, 3.93480224175673, 7.880492285021252, 15.288234691651045, 28.146271978815896, 48.27940530221799, 76.244084433538, 106.84612152804792, 132.41155485276818]
